definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: Also it is very helpful for lady's facial and spa treatment.
sentences.chinese: 同時它是非常有用的治療夫人的面部和溫泉浴場。

sentences.english: The Pinehurst Resort has eight golf courses and a spa.
sentences.chinese: 松樹林度假村有八個高爾夫球場，一個溫泉浴場。

sentences.english: All the way so far there were only 'private' beach areas, with pricey entry fees.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止整條路還是私人浴場區，門票極爲昂貴。

sentences.english: Guests enjoy free access to the sauna and solarium located in a neighbouring property, just 30 metres away.
sentences.chinese: 客人可以免費使用酒店的公共泳池以及溫泉浴場中心。

sentences.english: East End blue water Jinsha, excellent beach.
sentences.chinese: 東端碧水金沙，優良浴場。

sentences.english: Environment resources characteristic of the Meisha gulf and two beaches management style contain disadvantageous aspect.
sentences.chinese: 環境資源特徵和浴場管理模式有不利方面。

sentences.english: The local government closed the lido announcing that some sharks were emerging there.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府關閉了海濱浴場，宣稱海里有鯊魚出沒。

sentences.english: Jinyintan bathing place Located at Jingtang Port east side.
sentences.chinese: 金銀灘浴場位於京唐港東側。

sentences.english: She works as a masseuse at the bathing center.
sentences.chinese: 她在那家浴場中心做按摩技師。

sentences.english: East end blue water Jinsha, fine bathing place.
sentences.chinese: 東端碧水金沙，優良浴場。

sentences.english: We have a good time at the bathing beach.
sentences.chinese: 我們在海濱浴場玩得很開心。

sentences.english: The water at the bathing beach was polluted by refuse from the factory.
sentences.chinese: 海濱浴場水域被工廠排放的垃圾弄髒了。

sentences.english: He built a bathing pavilion, and named the area Brighton Beach, for the English seaside resort.
sentences.chinese: 這塊地被他開發成海濱浴場，並命名爲布萊頓沙灘。

sentences.english: Incidentally, can go to the second beach.
sentences.chinese: 順便可以到第二海水浴場。

sentences.english: In Harbin many people resort to the bathing beach in hot weather.
sentences.chinese: 在哈爾濱許多人在熱天裏常去浴場。

sentences.english: There were lots of people in the spa, and a princess was one of them.
sentences.chinese: 有很多人的在溫泉浴場，一位公主是其中之一。

definition: Cape Eluanpi or Eluanbi, southernmost point of Taiwan Island
balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Wulai township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
